#summary Known deficiencies in each release

This document describes the known deficiencies in each release

= Release 0.9.x beta =
  * !RangeServer recovery is not implemented.  This is the *highest* priority issue and is actively being worked on now.  It will be available soon in an upcoming "dot release"
  * System is not endian-neutral.  In other words, it won't work in a heterogeneous environment.
  * Hyperspace is currently single server.  The plan is to make Hyperspace a multi-server service using a consensus protocol.
